price: Whenever He wills something to be, He only says to it, “Be”, and it is.
arabic: إِنَّمَآ أَمۡرُهُۥٓ إِذَآ أَرَادَ شَيۡـًٔا أَن يَقُولَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
